item.title: Submitting a Post with Blogdown
item.description: Set up You will first need to set up an account on github and install git. Next, make a copy of the repository into your desired workspace. I like to keep all of my version controlled projects under one directory. Open up a command terminal of your choosing and use the following: cd #[working directory] git clone https://github.com/omahar/omahar.git git branch #[new branch] git checkout #[new branch] git push --set-upstream origin development After the initial set up you can open the R Project in Rstudio and use the IDE to handle most of the work you will need to do in git.
